Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
I am Ben Free a specialist personal trainer from the UK and my partner is working at The British International School. I am pleased to offer a Personal Fitness Training service at Bukit Utama 1 or at your own Condominium. (If you prefer I will shortly be able to train you using my own equipment in the comfort of your own home or outdoors). RM100 per hour session with discounts for block bookings. (Group sessions available on request). I have many years of experience with weight loss and sports specific training with great results achieved by my clients. To find out more information or to book a taster session please contact Ben on 01129144176 Hours of work: Monday to Friday 7am-7pm Saturday 9am-12pm Many Thanks Ben Free
Kind Regards,
Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
